data.what_is:
Solitics is an innovative customer engagement platform specializing in Visitor activation, Customer engagement and state-of-the-art Aanalytics suite. The platform enables B2C brands to automate, personalize and fully manage their customer life cycle, implementing most ambitious vision and driving growth.
With a commitment to rapid implementation (live in 45 days!) and continuous innovation, Solitics partners, and customers witness outstanding results across their conversion, retention and LTV.
Hundreds of worldwide brands across multiple verticals are engaging their customers in an innovative and personal way, in real timer, employing Solitics.
data.product_description: Solitics enables B2C brands to harness the power of ALL their data across all their data sources and create a personalized customer journey.Partnering with Solitics, companies can create user journeys and engage ALL customers, based on all their data, in real time. No limitations, starting the 1st visit on the website or app.Solitics' unique AI-data based management technology, enables brands to integrate all their data sources and multiple marketing channels, no matter how legacy or distributed data is. The three modules of Solitics' platform wholesomely cover every aspect of the user journey - conversion from the 1st visit, real-time retention journeys and state-of-the-art analytics and reporting suite for decision making and optimization, based on real time data.Solitics commit to a seamless and easy integration process, that will take up to 45 days until the customer is fully operation to start onboarding.

initial_reviews.review_title: The bespoke choice of marketing automation platforms
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Solitics?
As a marketing automation platform, Solitics provides enough options for non-technical users to hit the ground running and start "touching" their clients through multiple channels as soon as the platform is handed off. They also provide the tools and the flexibility for more technical users to perform much more complex and complicated operations. But the most important aspect is the support - there's always someone available to help you, and the people who you are in touch with are knowledgable and eager to help.

What do you dislike about Solitics?
Like any company, their development pipeline is complicated and does not always proritize requests for individual clients over requests which have a larger impact.

What problems is Solitics solving and how is that benefiting you?
Solitics is providing me with the tools and insights that I need in order to create automations based on my own custom segmentation for interacting with my clients.

initial_reviews.review_title: Straight to the point & user-friendly
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Solitics?
Solitics allows me to create personalized and automated customer journeys based on real-time data. The reverse integration helps more departments align, for example, marketing and sales. Segmentation is a plus - it generates multiple layers of customization and so on the Save Data feature.

What do you dislike about Solitics?
I dislike the time policy limitation at the customer journey level. This limitation forces me to create multiple journeys with the same characteristics to target different geographical regions with different timezones.

What problems is Solitics solving and how is that benefiting you?
Solitics helps me build the marketing automation infrastructure, reaching the audience via multiple channels. I use Solitics to build customer journeys that respond to users' actions, engage them with promotional and marketing communications, and reactivate lapsed users. The customization created via segmentation and the possibility of having dynamic content using smart placeholders enhance the results and diminish the operational effort.

initial_reviews.review_title: Sophisticated but easy-to-use marketing automation system
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Solitics?
The ability to segment the data properly while getting an easy integration abilities. Complexed journeys for different languages and the ability to drill down reports. Must mention the pop up function that operates by trigger of the user - converts amazing to leads and deposits.
Reacting LIVE in real time is the best feature no one is offering now in the industry. While my customers in the platform, I can react to them live and offer them promotions and keep them purchasing in the platform and track their behavior.

What do you dislike about Solitics?
The look of the system is a little bit outdated, but I don't judge the book by it cover. The UI is complexed for the small gaming companies. It must have a person dedicated on it or a small team to operate it as "SOLITICS team leads".

What problems is Solitics solving and how is that benefiting you?
Planing future campaigns and planning long-term strategy. We've created several emails for different segments such as leads, depositors, VIPs, and we've created several flows to get the ability to know our customers better.
We also generated a massive data breakdown and we know the behavior of our purchasers better so we could interact with them better and offer them better bonuses.
We can combine all the communication channels under 1 roof without forcing us to move from on platform to another - that force us to get analytics from different places.
